name: chilist
description: Barebone matching prototype for tech talent

scripts.postinstall: npm run build; npm run icons
scripts.icons: mkdir -p wwww/icons; icon-font-generator icons/*.svg -o www/icons --prefix icon
scripts.build: jade client/view -o www; browserify -v -t browserify-plain-jade -t babelify client/lib/index.js -o www/js/index.js; stylus -u nib -u griddy client/style/index.styl -o www/css/styles.css
scripts.watch: jade client/view -o www -w | watchify -v -t browserify-plain-jade -t babelify client/lib/index.js -o www/js/index.js | stylus -u nib -u griddy client/style/index.styl -w -o www/css/styles.css | livereload www

author: Tancredi Trugenberger
